about_text: As a prospective computer science student, I already have over two years of experience in self-taught programming. I have deepened my passion for web development through numerous personal projects and online courses. Especially in the field of frontend development, I was able to build solid knowledge in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I am highly motivated to bring my previous experience into a dual study program and to further develop my skills. My goal is to develop innovative and user-friendly web applications while always considering the latest technologies and best practices.
experience_text: Here you can find an overview of my previous positions and experience in development.
not_all: That's not all! You can find many more projects on my GitHub profile.
contact_text: Would you like to work with me or have questions? Feel free to send me a message!
